          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Picking Berries - the Past</string>
            <string language="en">Picking Berries - the Past</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sammeln-Beeren - die Vergangenheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Baies de cueillette - le passé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bagas da colheita - o passado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bacche di raccolto - l'esperienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μούρα επιλογής - το παρελθόν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bayas de la cosecha - el pasado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Complete the text by writing the correct past tense form of the given words.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">Complete the text by writing the correct past the form of the given words. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>

            <string language="sv">verb</string>

            <string language="en">grammar</string>

            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führen Sie den Text durch, indem Sie der 
korrekten Vergangenheit das Formular der gegebenen Wörter schreiben. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 5 - die 
Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remplissez le texte en écrivant au passé 
correct la forme des mots donnés. Safir - l'anglais et vie 
active pour les débutants - module 5 - qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termine o texto escrevendo ao passado correto o 
formulário das palavras dadas. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para os novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Completi il testo scrivendo all'esperienza 
corretta la forma di date parole. Safir - inglese e vita attiva 
per i principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπληρώστε το κείμενο με το γράψιμο το σωστού μετά 
από τη μορφή των δεδομένων λέξεων. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που είναι
εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termine el texto escribiendo al pasado correcto 
la forma de las palabras dadas. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral 
para los principiantes - módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>
